Press Next to continue the set-up:
MediaPortal turns your PC into a very advanced Multi-Media Centre / HTPC.
With MediaPortal you can enjoy listening to your favourite music and radio, view your digital photos,
watch Videos, DVDs, and live TV, and much more.
This wizard will help you to set up Mediaportal quickly and easily. Please follow all the steps,
and start by setting your language and location below:
Now press the Next button to begin
Congratulations. Mediaportal is now set up and ready to use
Press the Finish button to close this wizard

Press the Next button to configure these cards
